explains: n. 野外工作；现场工作；野战工事

sentences.en: Most of the fieldwork consisted of making tape recordings.
sentences.cn: 现场工作多半为进行磁带录音。

sentences.en: His introduction to fieldwork was a series of expeditions.
sentences.cn: 他初次参加的实地考察工作是一系列的探险活动。

sentences.en: When the ecologists had finished their fieldwork, they made a startling discovery.
sentences.cn: 完成野外研究之后，这些生态学家们有了一个惊人发现。
